description: Songwriting For Profit is designed to help the novice and experienced songwriter craft better songs that are memorable and market-ready, giving your songs a better chance of placement when pitched to the industry. The course covers the basics of songwriting including lyric writing, melody and harmony development, creating simple, effective demos and resources to help you with the pitch and placement process. Also included as a bonus is my "3-Song Critique" offered only to those who complete the entire course and do not seek a refund. If you have a desire to see your songs potentially earn income, then this is the right course for you!
title: Songwriting For Profit
